Dam Testing Annex Key.description: Opens 2 locked doors inside the Testing Annex onDam Battlegrounds. Keep in mind you can only unlock one of the two doors unless you bring two keys. Both doors are on the ground level with one being in the South side of the building and the other on the East side.
